name: David Ramirez
text: :  :  :  :  :  :  :  I was thinking more than just tech touch. I was thinking psychometry at a really high level, like not just getting memories out of touching objects, but also skills. Like the (oh he's not blind, just frail) guy, Kaos, in Alita. It would also allow her to self educate just from touching things.    I think of the blaster bolts as plasma, so while the stopped blast could still have energy for a while, it ought to have rapidly flickered away as it lost energy to the atmosphere. So, sf think: stopped time, or he contained its energy perfectly without losing any while he was stalking around and talking.
